branchCategory.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/4 ~ 1 inch, Flange 32A ~ 50A
branchCategory.description: <p>The updated VXD series is a pilot operated, 2 port solenoid valve. The new VXD is not only smaller, but uses less power compared to previous version. Available in brass and stainless steel, the VXD series also offers Class H coil insulation for high temperature applications. Flow rate ranges from Cv of 1.9 to 49. </p>

breadCrumb.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/4 ~ 1 inch, Flange 32A ~ 50A

branchItem.name: VXD2*3, Pilot Operated, 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Oil
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI> IP65 enclosure <LI>Thread or flange piping <LI>Standard FKM seal <LI> Port size: 1/4 to 1 inch, Flange: 32A to 50A </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: VXD2*6, Pilot Operated, 2 Port Solenoid Valve for High Temperature Oil
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>IP65 enclosure <LI>For use with high temperature oil, viscosity not exceed 50mm²/s <LI>Fluid temperature: -5 to 100°C <LI> Class H coil insulation <LI> Port size: 1/4 to 1 inch. Flange: 32A to 50A </LI></UL>
